XXbusto1_u:495: 1. metre: Upajāti prakāśitaṃ dharmavaraṃ praṇītaṃ sudurdṛśaṃ śāntikaraṃ prajāyai |
XXbusto1_u:497: taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā vyapanītakāṃkṣāś caranti vidvā satatāpramattāḥ |
XXbusto1_u:498: nyāyābhiyuktāḥ sugatasya vākye labhanti mokṣaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca nālpam || 2
XXbusto1_u:499: na sarvavidyā na dhanaṃ na bhaiṣajyā nyāyābhiyuktā vyapanenti duḥkham |
XXbusto1_u:501: ratnākaraṃ dharmaṃ imaṃ vigāhya labhanti bodhyaṅgabalendriyāṇi |
XXbusto1_u:502: te labdhalābhāḥ sukhitā aśokāḥ suniḥsṛtāḥ sarvabhavair vimuktāḥ || 4
XXbusto1_u:503: sudurlabhaḥ kalpaśatair anekair dharmo yaḥ svākhyāto jinapraśataḥ |
XXbusto1_u:504: taṃ prāpya dharmaṃ hy amṛtaṃ variṣṭhaṃ careta vidvā satatāpramattāḥ || 5
XXbusto1_u:505: 2. metre: Śloka putramāṃsāni bhuñjanta ātmamāṃsaṃ tathāpare |
XXbusto1_u:507: 3. metre: Śloka ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim
XXbusto1_u:508: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyān upāsate ||
